board-leave-dialog.description: Are you sure you want to leave this board? To join you will need to send a join request again.
board-leave-dialog.title: Leave board

general.max-length-50: The name cannot be longer than 50 characters
general.title: General

remove-dialog.description: This user will no longer be able to edit this board and create or edit its events. He will still be able ask to join.
remove-dialog.title: Remove user?

change-owner-dialog.description: Changing the board owner will mean that you will lose the ability to manage roles. You won't be able to undo this change.
change-owner-dialog.title: Are you sure you want to change the owner of the board?

subjects.max-length-30: The name cannot be longer than 30 characters
subjects.title: Subjects

change-display-name-dialog.hint: Your name will be visible to other users
change-display-name-dialog.title: Change display name

cookies-toast.message: Notice: this website uses Cookies in order to work properly

create.max-length-30-message: The name cannot be longer than 30 characters
create.start-using-message: Send the link to your friends and start using @:app-name!
create.subject-duplicate-message: A subject with this name has already been added
create.title: Create board

event-create-dialog.event-type-edit-hint: You can't change the event type while editing

not-a-board-member-message.create: In order to add events you have to be a board member
not-a-board-member-message.edit: In order to edit events you have to be a board member

not-signed-in-message.create: In order to add events you have to sign in
not-signed-in-message.edit: In order to edit events you have to sign in

rules.link-already-added: This link has already been added

event-create-dialog.subject: Subject
event-create-dialog.title: Title

join-request-reject-dialog.description: The user will still be able to ask to join again
join-request-reject-dialog.title: Are you sure you want to reject this join request?

leave-owner-message: The owner cannot leave the board
no-events-on-selected-day-message: There are no events on selected day
not-a-board-member-message: You aren't a member of this board
not-any-board-member-message: You aren't a member of any board

toasts.link-copied: Link has been copied to clipboard

sign-in.account-exists-with-different-credential: An account with the same email, but different provider already exists

unlink-dialog.description: After unlinking an account you won't be able to sign in using that provider

private.description: All information about the board, except for its name, is hidden from people, who haven't been added as board members.
private.title: Private

public.description: Everyone, who has the link to the board, can see added events, members list and activity. People, who haven't been added as board members cannot add and edit events.
public.title: Public
